Package com.segurosbolivar.automation.commons.jira.rcarz.jiraclient

Class JiraClient

java.lang.Object
com.segurosbolivar.automation.commons.jira.rcarz.jiraclient.JiraClient
public class JiraClient extends Object
A simple JIRA REST client.

    • createIssue

      public Issue.FluentCreate createIssue​(String project, String issueType) throws JiraException
      Creates a new issue in the given project.
      Parameters:
      project - Key of the project to create in
      issueType - Name of the issue type to create
      Returns:
      a fluent create instance
      Throws:
      JiraException - when something goes wrong

    • getIssue

      public Issue getIssue​(String key) throws JiraException
      Retreives the issue with the given key.
      Parameters:
      key - Issue key (PROJECT-123)
      Returns:
      an issue instance (issue includes all fields)
      Throws:
      JiraException - when something goes wrong

    • getIssue

      public Issue getIssue​(String key, String includedFields) throws JiraException
      Retreives the issue with the given key.
      Parameters:
      key - Issue key (PROJECT-123)
      includedFields - Specifies which issue fields will be included in the result.
      Some examples how this parameter works:
      • *all - include all fields
      • *navigable - include just navigable fields
      • summary,comment - include just the summary and comments
      • *all,-comment - include all fields
      Returns:
      an issue instance
      Throws:
      JiraException - when something goes wrong

    • getIssue

      public Issue getIssue​(String key, String includedFields, String expand) throws JiraException
      Retreives the issue with the given key.
      Parameters:
      key - Issue key (PROJECT-123)
      includedFields - Specifies which issue fields will be included in the result.
      Some examples how this parameter works:
      • *all - include all fields
      • *navigable - include just navigable fields
      • summary,comment - include just the summary and comments
      • *all,-comment - include all fields
      expand - issue fields to expand when getting issue data
      Returns:
      an issue instance
      Throws:
      JiraException - when something goes wrong

    • searchIssues

      public Issue.SearchResult searchIssues​(String jql) throws JiraException
      Search for issues with the given query.
      Parameters:
      jql - JQL statement
      Returns:
      a search result structure with results (issues include all navigable fields)
      Throws:
      JiraException - when the search fails

    • searchIssues

      public Issue.SearchResult searchIssues​(String jql, Integer maxResults) throws JiraException
      Search for issues with the given query and max results.
      Parameters:
      jql - JQL statement
      maxResults - limit the number of results
      Returns:
      a search result structure with results (issues include all navigable fields)
      Throws:
      JiraException - when the search fails

    • searchIssues

      public Issue.SearchResult searchIssues​(String jql, String includedFields) throws JiraException
      Search for issues with the given query and specify which fields to retrieve.
      Parameters:
      jql - JQL statement
      includedFields - Specifies which issue fields will be included in the result.
      Some examples how this parameter works:
      • *all - include all fields
      • *navigable - include just navigable fields
      • summary,comment - include just the summary and comments
      • *all,-comment - include all fields
      Returns:
      a search result structure with results
      Throws:
      JiraException - when the search fails

    • searchIssues

      public Issue.SearchResult searchIssues​(String jql, String includedFields, Integer maxResults) throws JiraException
      Search for issues with the given query and specify which fields to retrieve.
      Parameters:
      jql - JQL statement
      maxResults - limit the number of results
      includedFields - Specifies which issue fields will be included in the result.
      Some examples how this parameter works:
      • *all - include all fields
      • *navigable - include just navigable fields
      • summary,comment - include just the summary and comments
      • *all,-comment - include all fields
      Returns:
      a search result structure with results
      Throws:
      JiraException - when the search fails

    • searchIssues

      public Issue.SearchResult searchIssues​(String jql, String includedFields, Integer maxResults, Integer startAt) throws JiraException
      Search for issues with the given query and specify which fields to retrieve. If the total results is bigger than the maximum returned results, then further calls can be made using different values for the startAt field to obtain all the results.
      Parameters:
      restclient - REST client instance
      jql - JQL statement
      includedFields - Specifies which issue fields will be included in the result.
      Some examples how this parameter works:
      • *all - include all fields
      • *navigable - include just navigable fields
      • summary,comment - include just the summary and comments
      • *all,-comment - include all fields
      maxResults - if non-null, defines the maximum number of results that can be returned
      startAt - if non-null, defines the first issue to return
      Returns:
      a search result structure with results
      Throws:
      JiraException - when the search fails

    • getPriorities

      public List<Priority> getPriorities() throws JiraException
      Returns:
      a list of all priorities available in the Jira installation
      Throws:
      JiraException

    • getCustomFieldAllowedValues

      public List<CustomFieldOption> getCustomFieldAllowedValues​(String field, String project, String issueType) throws JiraException
      Get a list of options for a custom field
      Parameters:
      field - field id
      project - Key of the project context
      issueType - Name of the issue type
      Returns:
      a search result structure with results
      Throws:
      JiraException - when the search fails

      Parameters:

      issueType - Name of the issue type
      Returns:
      a search result structure with results

    • getProjects

      public List<Project> getProjects() throws JiraException
      Obtains the list of all projects in Jira.
      Returns:
      all projects; not all data is returned for each project; to get the extra data use getProject(String)
      Throws:
      JiraException - failed to obtain the project list.

    • getProject

      public Project getProject​(String key) throws JiraException
      Obtains information about a project, given its project key.
      Parameters:
      key - the project key
      Returns:
      the project
      Throws:
      JiraException - failed to obtain the project

    • getIssueTypes

      public List<IssueType> getIssueTypes() throws JiraException
      Obtains the list of all issue types in Jira.
      Returns:
      all issue types
      Throws:
      JiraException - failed to obtain the issue type list.
